mapper.select: SELECT p.postid, p.foodname,r.userid,p.nickname, COUNT(*) as reportCnt , p.ISBLINDED as status FROM post p LEFT JOIN report r ON p.postid = r.postid WHERE r.userid IS NOT NULL GROUP BY p.postid, p.foodname, p.nickname,p.ISBLINDED, r.userid
